== Introduction ==

This is the roadmap for `sbt`.  The current goals are mainly usability, documentation, and testing.

Comments and suggestions are welcome.

== Features ==
 * Test reporting improvements
 * Parallel test running
 * Ability to declare expected Scala, Java version

== Documentation ==

This list describes the documentation to be done.

 * API Documentation, especially:
  * `Project` and subclasses
 * Parallel execution

== Testing ==

 * Dependency analysis
 * More testing on `FileUtilities`.
